channel.title: Curiosity 718 - Join today - New - Under Development - 718/742 - Nice Features!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://curiosity752.weebly.com/uploads/2/8/0/0/28001697/1423081743.png[/img] [B]Hello fellow Scapers. Today i would like to give you some info about Curiosity![/B] [B]Website:[/B] [url=http://curiosity718.com/]Curiosity 718 - Helping you Succeed[/url] [B]Forums:[/B] [url=http://curiosity718.com/Forum]http://curiosity718.com/Forum[/url] [B]Highscores:[/B] [url=http://curiosity718.com/Highscores]http://curiosity718.com/Highscores[/url] [B]Vote:[/B] [url=http://curiosity718.com/vote]Curiosity - Voting[/url]
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Now what is Curiosity?[/B] Curiosity is a Runescape Private server, A Land of possibilities, we have Custom Combat, Bosses, Skills, Items and more. By custom we refeer to things that are from Real Runescape today, not Customs such as golden torva etc.
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Everyone is welcome nomatter how you behave / act. So why not? Join today for the best experience you could ever get. Friendly Community and Great Staff, Join today! [/B]
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Website:[/B] [url=http://Curiosity718.com]Curiosity 718 - Helping you Succeed[/url]
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]NOTE:[/B] This is a PvM - Eco Server, Bosses havebeen Nerfed / Buffed to make it more of a challenge.
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
Features:
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]General Info:[/B] All skills go to lvl 120 Complete with 120 Capes /w Particles. Ranged Attacking is 2x speed, ruby bolts disabled due to this. Attack Speed with melee is currently in process of getting 2x. Magic ^
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Minigames! :[/B] - Survival Minigame - Barrows - Crucible - CW - pvp - Fight Caves - Kiln
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Skilling Features:[/B] - Livid Farm - RuneSpan - Puro-Puro Hunter - Living Rock Caverns - Artisian's Workshop - WORKING Construction - Skill guilds: Mining (lvl 60)
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]In progress:[/B] Rewriting Js5, Fixing a dungeoneering / fight caves fault(error) Adding full Vorago; complete with Sirenic, Malenovant and Tectonic/Seismic Drops. Also adding global duelling
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]What do we have to offer as for now?[/B] Well we have a varities of Bosses in wich you could fight; such as: - All Godwars bosses including Nex. - Sunfreet, 90% Finished - Wildywyrm - Mercenary Mage - Blink - Kalphite King ( Currently Adding) - Soon to be added "Chaos Elemental" - King Black Dragon - QBD - Avatar's - Pest Queen - Party Demon
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Keep in mind that server is not near complete, and there will be several updates occuring in near future. Although it's already quite fun to play.[/B]
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Regards, Marius​, Owner and Developer of Curiosity 718.[/B]
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
[B]Note:[/B] Curiosity IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH RUNESCAPE OR JAGEX LTD IN ANY WAY. WE EXIST SOLELY FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES AND RESEARCH
[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]
This thread will be updated as it progresses, also looks and stuff wil be changed. Hook me up ingame if you have any questions or feedback!
[B]Credits: King Fox for the Source Base,[/B] Me: For everything that's added and changed upon. Nexus PVP for the download now Image. [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66135809/Curiosity.jar"][IMG]http://nexusrs.ca/images/Download-Now_button.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://curiosity718.com"][IMG]https://www.zarpor.com/images/play-now.gif[/img][/URL] [/CENTER] [CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/30dh2l4.png[/img]
[B]Vouches:[/B] [QUOTE=King Fox;Rune/ServerORG]Good luck bud <3
Vouch, good serbah indeed :D[/QUOTE][/CENTER]

@Fox2007 wrote:

Should definitely try this out. Very stable server base with plenty of stuff to do

item.title: Curiosity 718 - Join today - New - Under Development - 718/742 - Nice Features!
item.dc:creator: @AnxietyX AnxietyX
item.description:
@AnxietyX wrote:

[CENTER]
[B]Hello fellow Scapers. Today i would like to give you some info about Curiosity![/B]
[B]Website:[/B] Curiosity 718 - Helping you Succeed
[B]Forums:[/B] http://curiosity718.com/Forum
[B]Highscores:[/B] http://curiosity718.com/Highscores
[B]Vote:[/B] Curiosity - Voting

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Now what is Curiosity?[/B]
Curiosity is a Runescape Private server, A Land of possibilities,
we have Custom Combat, Bosses, Skills, Items and more.
By custom we refeer to things that are from Real Runescape today, not Customs such as golden torva etc.

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Everyone is welcome nomatter how you behave / act.
So why not? Join today for the best experience you could ever get.
Friendly Community and Great Staff, Join today! [/B]

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Website:[/B] Curiosity 718 - Helping you Succeed

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]NOTE:[/B] This is a PvM - Eco Server, Bosses havebeen Nerfed / Buffed to make it more of a challenge.

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

Features:

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]General Info:[/B]
All skills go to lvl 120 Complete with 120 Capes /w Particles.
Ranged Attacking is 2x speed, ruby bolts disabled due to this.
Attack Speed with melee is currently in process of getting 2x.
Magic ^

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Minigames! :[/B]

  • Survival Minigame
  • Barrows
  • Crucible
  • CW - pvp
  • Fight Caves
  • Kiln

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Skilling Features:[/B]

  • Livid Farm
  • RuneSpan
  • Puro-Puro Hunter
  • Living Rock Caverns
  • Artisian’s Workshop
  • WORKING Construction
  • Skill guilds: Mining (lvl 60)

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]In progress:[/B]
Rewriting Js5, Fixing a dungeoneering / fight caves fault(error)
Adding full Vorago; complete with Sirenic, Malenovant and Tectonic/Seismic Drops.
Also adding global duelling

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]What do we have to offer as for now?[/B]
Well we have a varities of Bosses in wich you could fight; such as:

  • All Godwars bosses including Nex.
  • Sunfreet, 90% Finished
  • Wildywyrm
  • Mercenary Mage
  • Blink
  • Kalphite King ( Currently Adding)
  • Soon to be added “Chaos Elemental”
  • King Black Dragon
  • QBD
  • Avatar’s
  • Pest Queen
  • Party Demon

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Keep in mind that server is not near complete, and there will be several updates occuring in near future. Although it’s already quite fun to play.[/B]

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Regards, Marius​, Owner and Developer of Curiosity 718.[/B]

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

[B]Note:[/B] Curiosity IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH RUNESCAPE OR JAGEX LTD IN ANY WAY. WE EXIST SOLELY FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES AND RESEARCH

[B]-----------------------------------------[/B]

This thread will be updated as it progresses, also looks and stuff wil be changed. Hook me up ingame if you have any questions or feedback!

[B]Credits: King Fox for the Source Base,[/B]
Me: For everything that’s added and changed upon.
Nexus PVP for the download now Image.
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66135809/Curiosity.jar”][/URL]
[URL=http://“http://curiosity718.com”][/URL]
[/CENTER]
[CENTER]

[B]Vouches:[/B]

[QUOTE=King Fox;Rune/ServerORG]Good luck bud <3

Vouch, good serbah indeed :D[/QUOTE][/CENTER]
